EmailTemplate.subject: 2 x The Points Till Wednesday
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
FREE Shipping*
Double the points on these office favourites: 7 Points
Kensington Privacy Screen FP240 $132.88 3 Points
Kensington Under-Desk Supershelf II $78.38 2 Points
StarTech.com HDMI to VGA Adapter Converter $42.99 1 Point
Grand & Toy Heavy-Duty Fold-Back Binder Clips $7.68 Don't forget to visit our Bonus Point Centre every month to get the most out of your rewards! Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1 866 391‑8111 <[[]]>
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions]]> or call 1 866 391‑8111 <[[]]> for details.
**Please allow up to 30 days for any bonus points to be added to your account. To check your current Grand Rewards points balance, please sign in to your account.
